item.title: 墨西哥重要财政官员将在过渡时期离职
item.description: 墨西哥财政部排名第二、任职时间最长的高级官员即将离任，这在总统换届期间是一个令人惊讶的发展，因为官员们一直在向投资者强调连续性。【原文：The second-highest-ranking and longest-tenured top official at Mexico’s finance ministry is set to leave his post, a surprise development amid a presidential transition where officials have been emphasizing continuity to investors.】

item.title: 关于《圣经》投资的存在性问题
item.description:
说到基于原则的投资，至少有两派观点

。【原文：

There’s at least two schools of thought when it comes to principles-based investing

】

item.title: Clearlake 支持的 Springs Window 寻求联合相互竞争的债务集团
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Clearlake Capital Group—backed Springs Window Fashions LLC 正在与两个债权人集团商讨债务重组协议，以便让最近对立的两派都加入进来。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group—backed Springs Window Fashions LLC is huddling with two creditor groups in search of a debt restructuring deal that would bring both recently-dueling factions on board, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 制糖巨头科森因杠杆问题考虑出售淡水河谷股份
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，亿万富翁鲁本斯-奥梅托（Rubens Ometto）的企业集团 Cosan SA 正在酝酿出售资产，其中包括其持有的矿业巨头淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）价值 22 亿美元的股份，这可能会解除为偿还债务而进行的一场变质的赌注。【原文：Billionaire Rubens Ometto’s conglomerate Cosan SA is mulling a sale of assets including its $2.2 billion stake in mining giant Vale SA, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially unwinding a soured bet to pay down debt.】

item.title: 农作物贸易商奥兰公司因延迟提交棉花销售报告被罚款 330 万美元
item.description: 农作物贸易商奥兰集团有限公司（Olam Group Ltd.）将因延迟向美国农业部和商品期货交易委员会报告棉花销售情况而支付 330 万美元的罚款，此举可能会影响棉花价格。【原文：Crop trader Olam Group Ltd. will pay a $3.3 million fine for delayed reporting of cotton sales to the US Department of Agriculture and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, a move that could have impacted cotton prices.】

item.title: 让梅根-埃里森的视频游戏部门崩溃的权力斗争
item.description:
高管之间的冲突导致安纳普尔那互动公司（Annapurna Interactive）的所有员工辞职，使得这位技术女继承人急于挽救其公司的视频游戏雄心

。【原文：

A clash between executives prompted all of the employees of Annapurna Interactive to quit, leaving the technology heiress scrambling to save her company’s video-game ambitions

】

item.title: 埃利奥特关联公司以 72.8 亿美元的出价赢得 Citgo 拍卖会
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司在 Citgo 石油公司母公司的拍卖中以 72.8 亿美元的出价成为领先竞标者，从而得以收购这家曾是委内瑞拉最大外国资产的炼油企业。【原文：An Elliott Investment Management affiliate emerged as the leading bidder in an auction for Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent company with a bid for $7.28 billion, allowing it to acquire an oil refiner that was once Venezuela’s largest foreign asset.】

item.title: 中国敦促本土企业远离英伟达芯片
item.description: 中国政府正在加大对中国公司的施压力度，要求它们购买本地生产的人工智能芯片，而不是英伟达公司的产品，这是中国努力扩大半导体产业和对抗美国制裁的一部分。【原文：Beijing is stepping up pressure on Chinese companies to buy locally produced artificial intelligence chips instead of Nvidia Corp. products, part of the nation’s effort to expand its semiconductor industry and counter US sanctions.】

item.title: 中国和天气刺激农作物期货反弹，本周有望走强
item.description: 大豆期货创下一年多来的最大单周涨幅，主要进口国中国的经济刺激政策和主要产区的恶劣天气推动了谷物市场的广泛反弹。【原文：Soybean futures headed for the biggest weekly gain in more than a year amid a broader grains rally driven by economic stimulus in top importer China and adverse weather in major growing regions.】

item.title: 美国指控英国男子黑客攻击高管邮件进行非法交易
item.description: 一名英国男子被美国检察官指控入侵公司高管的电子邮件账户，以获取机密的盈利信息。【原文：A British man was charged by US prosecutors with hacking corporate executives’ email accounts to obtain confidential earnings information.】

item.title: 巴拿马认为出口库存的第一量子铜矿是可行的
item.description: 巴拿马财政部长表示，他认为第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）没有充分理由不出口其在该国已关闭矿山中储存的大量铜矿。【原文：Panama’s finance chief said he sees no good reason why First Quantum Minerals Ltd. shouldn’t export the large volume of copper stockpiled at its shuttered mine in the country.】

item.title: 花旗集团希望通过阿波罗交易成为一站式债务商店
item.description: 花旗集团债务资本市场全球主管理查德-佐格布（Richard Zogheb）表示，花旗集团和阿波罗全球管理公司 "不可能复制的关系 "促成了这一具有里程碑意义的私人信贷合作。【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Apollo Global Management Inc.’s “impossible to replicate relationship” is what brought the landmark private credit partnership to fruition, said Richard Zogheb, the bank’s global head of debt capital markets.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋称核能是为数据中心供电的一种选择
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.该公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，核电是为日益增多的数据中心提供所需可再生能源的一个不错选择。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang, who helped create the technology at the heart of the explosion in artificial intelligence computing, said nuclear power is a good option for the renewable energy needed for the growing number of data centers.】

item.title: 美国法院支持在可再生能源事件中执行针对西班牙的仲裁裁决
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份法庭文件，哥伦比亚特区联邦法院授权执行一项仲裁裁决，该裁决有利于受西班牙追溯性撤销可续保保费影响的其中一家公司。【原文：A federal court for the District of Columbia authorized the enforcement of an arbitration award favoring one of the companies affected by Spain’s retroactive withdrawal of renewable premiums, according to a court document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 印度放宽大米出口限制，为全球消费者提供缓冲
item.description: 印度放松了对部分大米出口的限制，此举可能会缓解全球大米价格，并预示着近期全国大选后国内农业政策的转变。【原文：India loosened restrictions on some rice exports, a move that may ease global prices and signal a shift in domestic agricultural policies following the recent national elections.】

item.title: 微软受人诟病的人工智能 "召回 "系统重启安全功能
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp.）宣布对人工智能功能 "Recall "进行升级。"Recall "可记录用户在个人电脑上所做的一切，此前曾有批评称该工具为黑客提供了一个极具吸引力的目标。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has announced upgrades for Recall, an artificial intelligence feature that creates a record of everything users do on their PCs, following criticism that the tool created an attractive target for hackers.】

item.title: 斯塔默就亿万富翁对英国的最新嘲讽回击马斯克
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，埃隆-马斯克对英国的看法与其他主要投资者不一致，此前这位世界首富继续与工党新政府打嘴仗，称 "没有人应该去英国"。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Elon Musk’s views on Britain are out of sync with other major investors, after the world’s richest man continued his war of words with the new Labour government by saying “no one should go to the UK.”】

item.title: 摩根大通表示买入墨西哥国家石油公司债券，评级可能上调
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）表示，在信用评级可能上调之前，是时候对墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos SA）的债券进行增持了。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos SA bonds rallied after JPMorgan Chase & Co. said it’s time to load up on the debt ahead of a possible credit-rating upgrade.】

item.title: 对冲基金亿万富翁马歇尔对电报的兴趣降温
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，对冲基金经理保罗-马歇尔对收购英国《每日电讯报》报业集团的兴趣正在降温。【原文：Hedge fund manager Paul Marshall’s interest in acquiring the UK’s Telegraph newspaper group is cooling, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 据说瑞安-雷诺兹的 MNTN 公司将于 2025 年向摩根士丹利申请 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由好莱坞明星瑞安-雷诺兹（Ryan Reynolds）担任首席创意官的联网电视广告平台 MNTN 已选择摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为其首次公开募股工作提供服务。【原文：MNTN, a connected TV advertising platform that counts Hollywood star Ryan Reynolds as its chief creative officer, has picked Morgan Stanley to work on an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大众汽车再次下调汽车需求预测
item.description: 由于乘用车需求疲软，大众汽车公司今年第二次下调了其年度指导目标，这标志着陷入困境的德国汽车行业遭受了最新的打击。【原文：Volkswagen AG cut its annual guidance for a second time this year on weak demand for its passenger cars, marking the latest blow to Germany’s struggling automotive sector.】

item.title: 美国指控伊朗特工涉嫌黑客攻击特朗普竞选团队
item.description: 美国司法部宣布对三人提出指控，指控他们在伊朗支持下开展行动，入侵前总统唐纳德-特朗普的竞选团队。【原文：The US Justice Department announced charges against three people for allegedly carrying out an Iranian-backed operation to hack the campaign of former President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 赞比亚同意与中国贷款方重整 15 亿美元债务
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西坦贝科-穆索科特瓦内（Situmbeko Musokotwane）表示，赞比亚已与两家中国国有贷款机构达成协议，重组15亿美元的债务，这是结束长达数年之久的债务重组进程的重要一步。【原文：Zambia has reached a deal with two Chinese state-owned lenders to restructure $1.5 billion in debt, according to Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane, a major step toward concluding a years-long process.】

item.title: 一位丹麦首席执行官从勒索软件破产中汲取的教训
item.description: 当小企业无力支付勒索软件费用时会发生什么？但首先...【原文：What happens when a small business can’t afford a ransomware payment? But first…】

item.title: 2011年第三季度意外反弹，小额债券将创下最佳业绩
item.description: 市政市场将迎来 2011 年以来最好的第三季度，三个月期间的回报率约为 2.6%。【原文：The municipal market is set for its best third quarter since 2011, with a return of about 2.6% during the three-month period.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：现在购买，日后改变商业周期
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 好莱坞汽车特技表演变为街头抢劫的真实罪行
item.description: 加利福尼亚州是热车文化和电视警匪追逐战的发源地，正在严厉打击激增的致命街头霸占行为。【原文：California, the birthplace of hot rod culture and televised police chases, is cracking down on a surge in deadly street takeovers.】

item.title: 中国威胁加剧，通用、福特股价大幅反弹受阻
item.description: 本以为今年会是百年汽车制造商通用汽车公司和福特汽车公司股价东山再起的一年，但久违的追涨势头已经停滞不前。【原文：It was expected to be the comeback year for the shares of century-old carmakers, General Motors Co. and Ford Motor Co., but a long overdue catch-up rally is already stalling.】

item.title: Peach 地产股东批准出售股份，引导 Ares 退出董事会
item.description: 桃子地产集团（Peach Property Group AG）的投资者批准了一项股票发行计划，以帮助这家住宅业主应对即将到期的债务。【原文：Peach Property Group AG investors approved a stock offering to help the residential landlord deal with upcoming debt maturities, a sale that may be complicated by the fact that they also kicked the biggest shareholder off the board of directors.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦称经济前景正在恶化
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）在其领导的西班牙中央银行发布的一份报告中称，该地区的经济前景正在恶化。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva said the region’s economic outlook is getting worse, according to a presentation published by Spain’s central bank, which he heads.】
